sen.e: The term "Kamon" refers to a crest which has been used to show one's origin, that is, family lineage, blood line, ancestry and status from ancient times especially in Japan.

sen.cmt: I have left "特に" untranslated as this would suggest that other countries also use Kamon, which is not the case. In England for example, knights would have a coat of arms, not a Kamon.
